If **shot size or spatial position** changes, describe how these transitions occur clearly, specifying both the **initial and final states**.

This older man, also in a dark suit and with light-colored hair, stands to the right of the table, facing the main subject and gesturing with his right hand as if speaking. Please note that the video features **multiple subjects with a clear main focus**, so the description should focus on the main subject.
